transcript_chunks.text: Immortals of avium on the kind of funny scale for me is a three out of five now being on the other side of like 13 15 hours of it there is heart there there it is endearing in places it's just muddled I feel again that's not me saying throw it out it's garbage it's me I had a good time with this game with the exception of some of the ends boss fights because it has a great setup it has characters you're dropped into and I immediately cared about I cared about their relationships I think Jack's performance is great they take these great characters and toss you with them into the deep end of just this world they've created and the thousands of years of magic history and I think their villain is really one note in general it is a good looking game I think but it's generic looking the shooting mechanics I do think feel good yeah so I enjoyed the magic shooting of it running around and doing my business they get you to the final things and it is like now we really want to remind you of a

mechanics I do think feel good yeah so I enjoyed the magic shooting of it running around and doing my business they get you to the final things and it is like now we really want to remind you of a PS3 PS2 era game of like we are going to give you these crushing battles that are just not fun to do there is fun to be had in this game but it is not a rush out buy it right now for full price
